Reviews.Title: “Not for human beings - will close in February 2012”
Reviews.Author: b k
Reviews.Content: lived started improvements bathrooms 4 months dirty smell pee toilets little late closing smoke drink beer except courtyard fit dog apart trouble staff fit humans

Reviews.Title: “Great price for location”
Reviews.Author: platos33
Reviews.Content: mother stayed 2 12 weeks found location near paddington royal oak tube corner red bus road close shops cafes nearby 510 min walk bit unclean looked bathroom floor hadnt mopped apart quiet microwave fridge downside week hot water whenever week hot water wait return annoying 11pm night day pay wifi found cheap 1 pound hour price paid value stay base day trips london

Reviews.Title: “The worst hostel in London”
Reviews.Author: jmrt_86
Reviews.Content: hi im spanish london study english month hostel poor walls unclean toilet beds lot bedbugs hostel service bad kitchen unclean bleach time ate dont recommend hostel

Reviews.Title: “Too far away”
Reviews.Author: CamillaW2
Reviews.Content: hostel situated city center especially youve doing lot shopping managable private twin beds nice lockers ensuite bathroom cleanliness expected desk staff nice except kitchen lady didnt exactly feel welcome hurrying serving

Reviews.Title: “Very very nice hostel”
Reviews.Author: we_are_working_on_it
Reviews.Content: spent days hostel february friends impression deal pounds deserve location nice equipped clean sparkling linen nice breakfast included ive london deal expensive city ages truly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Nice location and affordable price”
Reviews.Author: Evgeni33
Reviews.Content: nice hostel staffs helpful smiles makes customers easier communicate price affordable location close center city thats met nice people countries enjoyed staying hostel im time ill recommended friends
